meaning: 1. Regret (slapping thigh) 2. Laugh out loud (slapping thigh)
description: 1. Slapping one's thigh in regret. 2. Slapping one's thigh while laughing. "Bao da tui" means "riding coattails".

examples.chinese: 手快有手慢无,错过拍大腿啊
examples.translation: Quick hands get it, slow hands miss it, you'll slap your thigh in regret if you miss it

examples.chinese: 必看剧,不看后悔拍大腿哦
examples.translation: Must-watch drama, you'll regret it (slap thigh) if you don't watch

examples.chinese: 有人笑到拍大腿,有人笑到眼泪
examples.translation: Some laugh till they slap their thighs, others laugh till they cry
